Downtown Penthouse

1010 Brickell avenue, miami,FL

$ 452000

Bed : 4
Bath : 3
Sqft : 1450

This luxurious downtown penthouse boasts 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and 3,500 sqft of living space. With stunning views of the city and the ocean, this property is perfect for entertaining. The open-concept living and dining area features floor-to-ceiling windows, while the gourmet kitchen is equipped with top-of-the-line appliances. The master suite includes a spacious walk-in closet and a luxurious marble bathroom. The outdoor living area features a private pool and plenty of seating to take in the breathtaking views. Building amenities include a fitness center, and spa.
